channel.title: Need help changing reg mage to ancient
channel.description: I need to know if i just go to the alter or something?

item.title: Need help changing reg mage to ancient
item.dc:creator: @gunsnroses gunsnroses
item.description:
@gunsnroses wrote:

hi ive been testin many private servers lately there ar many answers to your question.
answers:
A}::switch
B}It is next to friends tab in blank space
c}Alter
D}Dark mage
hope this helps =}

Read full topic

well it depends evryones server is diffrent, there is usally a drak mage in varrock, but apart from that i dont no.

item.title: Need help changing reg mage to ancient
item.dc:creator: @udluv2 udluv2
item.description:
@udluv2 wrote:

The ancient mage tab should be to the left of the friends tab. If not there should be a command called magic or something like that. If thats not the command go to client.java and search converts and it should be in the command.

Or talk to the dark mage.

Read full topic
